content: k2tog p3 ssk k1 row 22 on the fourth repeat and so on while yo k2 k2tog with edge stitch working chart b eight times ending with row 22 row 5 p2 ssk yo k5 yo k2tog p3 ssk yo k3 and there are 185 sts then work the knit on edging k2tog with edge stitch found in chart c all wrong side row are purled row 7 k1 yo k2 k2tog p3 ssk k2 yo k1 yo k2 k2tog p1 k1 k2tog with edge stitch row 13 rs k1 yo p1 22 purl all stitches k1 k2tog with edge stitch row 15 k1 yo k3 k10 yo k1 yo k10 k3 yo k1 33 sts short row center row 17 k1 yo k5 p10 yo k1 yo p10 k5 yo work to one stitch to the right of stitch marker k1 37 sts ending with row 2 of 16th repeat and work short row 19 k1 yo k7 yo k2tog five times yo k1 row center instructions yo ssk yo five times k7 yo k1 41 sts row 3 rs p2 ssk k1 yo k3 yo k1 k2tog p3 row 21 k1 yo k9 p10 yo k1 yo p10 k9 yo ssk k1 yo k2 turn k1 45 sts row 4 ws p19 row 5 rs p2 ssk yo k5 yo k2tog p3 ssk yo stitch counts after chart b repeats 45 65 85 105 k3 k2tog with edge stitch 125 145 165 185 stitches row 6 ws slip 1 purlwise p19 row 7 rs k1 yo k2 k2tog p3 ssk k2 yo k1 yo k2 k2tog p1 k1 k2tog with edge stitch chart c row 8 ws slip 1 purlwise p19 without breaking yarn and using the knitted cast-­ row 9 rs k2 yo k1 k2tog p3 ssk k1 yo k3 yo on method cast on 20 sts work chart c knitting k1 k2tog p1 k1 turn last edge stitch together with one stitch from main row 10 ws p19 body stitches on all odd row row 11 rs k3 yo k2tog p3 ssk yo k5 yo repeat chart c until one stitch before stitch marker k2tog p1 k1 k2tog with edge stitch is reached then complete the short row center row 12 ws slip 1 purlwise p19 purl all ws row slipping the first stitch of each purl row continue on as before on chart c work until all main body stitches are consumed purl one row row 1 p2 ssk k2 yo k1 yo k2 k2tog p3 ssk k2 more and bind off remaining stitches weave in yo k1 k2tog with edge stitch ends and block row 2 and all even-­ numbered ws row
